SUB_W12_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Cripes, this world's a chilly one.
Fella can see his breath and everything.

SUB_W12_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Well, this is a deal. Got folks frozen
solid—and heck, even entire villages.

SUB_W12_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text: But hang on just a second there. Sure, it's cold, but not that cold—heck, winters in Miyako City are worse than this. So why'd everybody here get turned into popsicles?

SUB_W12_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.text:
Sweet cripes, everything and everyone's
frozen solid! This world sure is a wild one.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh wow, mister! You're not frozen!
Boy, am I ever glad to see you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Took the words right outta my mouth
there, kid. You from around here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_02.text:
I sure am, sir. My name's Alexandre.
Are you visiting?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Yep. Oh, and the name's Tsunanori Mido.
So what happened to all these frozen folks?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_04.text:
I wish I knew. Everything was normal when I went
down into the mine this morning, but when I came
back up? Boom! Everything was frozen solid.
I figure it's because of the curse, but...

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Oh, right. You wouldn't know about that, huh?
So, there was this emperor a long time ago.
He died cursing the people of Grelon, saying he'd
eventually freeze them right down to their hearts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_06.text:
I guess 'eventually' turned out
to be today.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_07.text: Well, I don't want to shoot that theory down, but are you sure that's the deal here? I mean, you're not frozen, so maybe you did something that caused all this.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_08.text:
What? No! I didn't do anything,
Mr. Mido, I swear! As for why I'm not frozen, the only thing
I can think of is that it has something to do
with these matches I brought into the mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_09.text:
Their light is supposed to ward off evil,
so maybe they kept me from freezing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_10.text:
Huh. Well, do you think maybe those matches
could help thaw all the folks that went and
got themselves frozen?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Hey, that's a good idea! Will you come
with me while I try to unfreeze people?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_13.text: Yeah, no. But good luck with that.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_14.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_14.text:
By the way, you heard any talk
about spirits in these parts?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_15.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_15.text:
Sorry, I don't know anything about spirits.
Um, but maybe some of the frozen people
could tell you something?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_16.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_16.text: But I have no idea what I'm doing!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_01.text:
Took the words right outta my mouth there,
kid—thought I was gonna be wandering
this place for the rest of my life. So the name's Tsunanori Mido.
You from around here, maybe?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_02.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_02.text:
I sure am, although I have no idea what's going
on at the moment. Everything was normal when I
went down in the mine this morning, but when I
came back up? Boom! Everything was frozen.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_03.text:
So this whole mess only happened today? Huh.
Sounds to me like something spirits might be
responsible for, but I can't be sure about that. You don't happen to know of any place around
here that powerful spirits hang out, do you?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_04.text:
Sorry, but I don't know anything about spirits.
Honestly, I'm more concerned about unfreezing
all of these people, but I don't even know how
to start. Oh, it's all that curse's fault!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_07.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_07.text: So, what? I do something about this curse and that'll get me the power of a spirit, is that it? This whole setup seems suspiciously convenient. Not to be rude, guy, but I don't suppose there's a chance you actually started this whole freezing business, maybe? I mean, you are the only one who's not on ice right now.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_10.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_10.text: So now I need to run around thawing folks with some magical matches? Heck, that smells like even more of a setup. I mean, can I even trust this here fella? The fact he's a kid is plenty suspicious— but then if I don't help him, the little guy'll probably buy the farm out here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_11.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_11.text:
So will you come with me and try
to help the others, Mr. Mido?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_13.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_13.text: Yeah, no. I think you got it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_14.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_14.text:
I'm gonna ask one more time, kid:
you sure you don't know anything about
any spirits wandering around here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_03.text:
So everything froze today, eh?
That's a bit strange. Also, why aren't you a popsicle, kid?
Not to sound too out there, but did you
maybe do something to cause all this?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_04.text:
What? No! I didn't do anything, I swear!
It has to be because of the curse! Oh, right. You wouldn't know about that, huh?
So there's an emperor from a long time ago who
died cursing the people of Grelon, saying he'd
eventually freeze 'em right down to their hearts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_05.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_05.text:
I'm guessing this is all happening because
of the curse—and that the reason I'm not
frozen is because of these matches.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_07.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_07.text:
Mind if I ask who gave you those matches?
Because I'm betting whoever it was is
responsible for this whole freezing deal.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_08.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_08.text:
I... Oh, weird! I don't know who gave them to me!
I found them in my pocket this morning, which is
why I decided to go into the mine, but everything
before that is a blank.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_09.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_09.text:
Why give the matches to this kid? I bet things
are gonna unfold differently depending on who
he decides to thaw, but... Why? What's the point
of having him do all that?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_10.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_10.text:
Listen up, guy. I think whoever gave you those
matches wants you to go around thawing folks
for some reason we don't know.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_11.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_11.text:
So you still wanna do that knowing there's
somebody else pulling the strings here?
Give it a good think.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_12.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_12.text: I don't care! I want to save everyone!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_13.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_13.text: I don't want to be used. That's...scary.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_14.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_14.text:
I like your guts, kid—and that's why I'm gonna
help you do this. But before we get going,
you haven't heard anything about spirits, maybe?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_16.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_16.text: Hey, I get it. No judgment here.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_800_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_800_00.text:
I've only got eight matches left, which is
probably not enough to save everyone.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_400_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_400_00.text:
We've already used half the matches.
There's only four left.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_00.text: We've only got one match left.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_01.text:
Guess we better think real hard about
who we wanna be saving, huh?

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_00.text:
That was the last match.
We can't save anyone else.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Welp, I've done all I can. Guess it's up to
the folks in this world to finish the job.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_02.text: No, Mr. Mido! Please don't say that! I want to find a way to save everyone!

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_03.text:
I get that you want to save everyone, kid,
but bringing the power of spirits home
is my priority here, sooo...

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_04.text: Well, heck. Guess I'll help ya.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_05.text: Nope. Time for me to split.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Say, kid. The final emperor was the one thing
all those folks' dreams had in common, right?
So who was this fella? Tell me about him.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_07.text:
They say he cast the last rays of light upon
an empire standing on the brink of collapse.
He ended up confined in his palace when his
people rebelled, and then the empire crumbled.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_08.text:
And his palace is the big fancy
place right over there, yeah?

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_09.text:
Welp, guess we better swing by and check it out.
If there's a way to save all the folks he froze,
we'll probably find it somewhere in there.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_10.text:
Oh, thank you, Mr. Mido!
Thank you so much!

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Hey, don't think twice about it, kid.
Heck, I think this'll probably end up
helping me out in the long run.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_13.text:
Welp, I did what I could here.
Time to find the power of the spirits.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_01.text:
One thing I know for certain, guy, is that
everything is connected to the final emperor—
which means you gotta go solve his mystery.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_03.text:
Is this kid trying to get me involved specifically,
or is he honestly just out here looking for help?
In any case, none of this is getting me closer
to finding any spirits. Cripes almighty. This whole deal
is a real dill of a pickle.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_04.text: Eh, I'll stick with the kid a while longer.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_05.text: Yeah, no. Time to go find some spirits.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_06.text:
All right, guy. Let's you and me go solve
the mystery of the final emperor together.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_07.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_07.text:
Gee, Mr. Mido! Thanks a bunch! Okay,
so the palace where the emperor was
locked away is at the top of that hill.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_08.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_08.text:
Right. Guess we better swing by
and check it out.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_03.text:
Still haven't figured out who's pulling the
strings behind the scenes with this kid.
Can I really just leave him here without
knowing how it all ends?

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_04.text: Nope! Gonna see this through to the end.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_06.text:
I got no idea who gave you those matches, kid—
or why they did it. But I'm sure as shoot not
gonna leave you here all by your lonesome.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_07.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_07.text:
Gee, Mr. Mido! Thanks! Now let's go to
the emperor's palace on top of that hill.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_00.text:
That was the last of the matches.
We can't save anyone else.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Kid seems pretty done with this, eh?
Maybe I should just leave him be and
get back to lookin' for spirits.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_03.text: It's okay to give up, fella.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_04.text: But there's nothing else I can do!

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_05.text:
Look, kid. The final emperor was the one thing
all those folks' dreams had in common, yeah?
So tell me about him. Who was he?

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_06.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_06.text:
They say he cast the last rays of light upon
an empire standing on the brink of collapse.
He ended up confined in his palace when his
people rebelled, and then the empire crumbled.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_07.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_07.text:
And his palace is the big fancy
place right over there, yeah?

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_08.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_08.text:
If so, I guess we better swing by and
check it out. If there's a way to save
all the folks he froze, we'll probably
find it somewhere in there.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_09.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_09.text:
Gee, Mr. Mido, I'm sorry. I guess I can't
just give up on everyone like that, huh?

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_10.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_10.text:
I'm just glad to see that glint back in
your eye. Now pull on the big-boy pants
and let's give this thing a go.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_11.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_11.text:
I won't give up again, Mr. Mido.
I promise.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_12.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_12.text:
Hey, you tried your best, right?
Nobody's gonna blame you for that.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_13.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_13.text: Thanks, Mr. Mido. That means a lot.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_01.text: I was suspicious of the kid, but if he's already giving up, maybe he's not involved? And if that's the case, maybe it means I'm the one who shouldn't give up...

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_05.text:
If there's one thing I know, kid, it's that
everything's connected to the final emperor.
So let's go solve his mystery together.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_06.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_06.text:
You're right, Mr. Mido!
If we do that, we might still be
able to unfreeze everyone! And, um, I'm sorry for giving up.
I shouldn't have done that.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_08.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_08.text:
The final emperor's palace is on top
of that hill. Let's go!

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_210_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MATCHES_210_CUT_000_01.text:
If the kid gives up now, I'll never learn
who gave him those dang matches—or why.
Is that really what I want?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey, that's Leia! Leia! Hey, Leia!
LEIA, CAN YOU HEAR ME!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_010.text:
Geez, kid, calm down before
you burst something important.
I take it you know this lady?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_020.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, Leia is wonderful! She's a scholar
on a survey team who knows all sorts
of fascinating stories about the past.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_030.text:
Sounds impressive. Maybe we could ask
this smarty-pants how everything here
went and got itself frozen.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_040.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm going to use a match to save her.
Are you ready?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Sure am, bud. The name's Tsunanori.
Kid here says you're a real egghead,
so I'm hoping you maybe know why
everything's got the cold shoulder?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Sadly, I have no idea—though perhaps we
could learn more from the other people
young Alexandre frees from the ice.
Would you be willing to help with this?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Sure, why not. Got my own question
for the folks around here anyway.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_190.text:
I don't know if I can answer this question
of yours, but I'm happy to try.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text: Hello, Alexandre. What brings you to Duvall?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
The library. We're hoping to do
some research on ancient symbols.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text: How scholarly of you! Well, I know you could learn a great deal about them from Nicolas Flamel's Encyclopaedia Alchemica, but I fear it is an extremely dangerous book. Its most important page is protected by mighty guardian beasts charged with keeping its secrets; even Leia from the survey team has decided not to attempt it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
This book sounds like just what we need.
We'll take our chances with the guardians.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
In that case, I'll go prepare our
sturdiest room for you. Good luck.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
This here's the page we want, all right;
thing's chock-full of power.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
The text says not to touch it, Mr. Mido.
So, um... Are you sure you want to?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
Guess this is the thawing seal
we need to deal with.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
I don't think we have enough artifacts
to make this shape.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
Then let's do another loop and see if
we can't find a few more lying around.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text: Boy, this slope sure is steep...

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
You made it sound like you were one heck
of a skier, kid. Don't tell me you were
just trying to show off for Morgane?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text: L-like you wouldn't do the same!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Heh. Sure, kid. Let's just take it slow,
yeah? The whole idea is to fail here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I know—but I'd still rather do it
right once and impress Morgane!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Ghost must have really wanted to
tell somebody about this place.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I suppose—but I still don't understand
why it would only come out if we failed
at a skiing challenge.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
'Cause failure is the greatest teacher,
maybe? Yeah, let's go with that.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I did it! I actually pulled it off!
Morgane is going to think I'm SO cool!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
What are you so happy about, ya knucklehead?
The whole point here was to fail.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Whoops! That's right. It felt so good
to be skiing that I completely forgot!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Oh, for the love of...
Let's go again, then.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.text:
Might be a touch dangerous, but all I can
think to do is explore this old mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.text: I'm counting on you, Mr. Mido!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.text:
If we got fiends bumping around here,
that means there might be artifacts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Help! Fiends! Fiends appeared out
of nowhere and tore my fields apart!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Wow, that's terrible. Do you think it's
related to the curse of the final emperor?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Couldn't say, but I'm not the type to just
walk away and let a buncha baddies tear
some poor fella's fields apart.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: Well, Alexandre! You saved me again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Pretty sure I did all
the work there, guy...

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
I can't offer much in thanks, but you can
take anything you like from the windmill.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: Maybe we'll find a long-lost treasure.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: All I see are bags of flour.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Wait, hold on... Isn't this an artifact?
What's it even doing here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: Should probably show that to Guillaume.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
That's ours now. Guillaume said we could
take what we liked, and we don't want him
tangled up in all this anyway.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: I was thinking the same thing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
Have you heard about any ancient artifacts
being found in this mine, Esperance?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
This is a mine, not an archaeological site.
Also, the other mines are still frozen,
and I have my hands VERY full dealing
with all of them at the moment. Now perhaps you can go unfreeze those
other mines and stop pestering me with
all of these inane questions?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
Now hold on just a minute there, bud.
Alexandre doesn't owe you an apology
or anything else. This kid's been workin' his tail off for
all you people, and you've got no call to be
giving him a bunch of guff.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
Yes, I suppose he did save my life... My apologies, Alexandre. I've been terribly
busy trying to find out what's going on in
the other mines, and I fear it's left my
temper rather frayed.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
In that case, we'll check them out for you!
If I see anything out of the ordinary,
I'll come let you know right away.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
That would be a huge help.
Thank you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text: Do be careful out there, all right?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.text:
It's almost like you just wanted an excuse
to check these mines for artifacts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.text: The thought did cross my mind... Let's see what we can find!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.text:
Guess I shouldn't have figured
it would come so easy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.text: Why'd you agree to get firewood, kid?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.text:
Because this could also be
connected to the artifacts!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.text: Well, heck. Let's get to searching, then.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.text: I know. Also, this wood was really heavy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.text:
Holy moly, was this ever a
massive waste of time.

SUB_W12_GIMK_MIDO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_GIMK_MIDO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text: Hang on, I think an artifact just fell out! So Virgile really did see one in the woods!

SUB_W12_GIMK_MIDO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_GIMK_MIDO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text: Let's just hold on to that.

SUB_W12_GIMK_MIDO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_GIMK_MIDO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text: Should probably show that to Virgile.

SUB_W12_GIMK_MIDO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_GIMK_MIDO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text:
Virgile didn't even seem to remember seeing
this artifact—and besides, we don't want to
get the poor fella tangled up in our mess.

SUB_W12_GIMK_MIDO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_GIMK_MIDO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text:
Virgile found this first, so we oughta
talk things over with him, maybe?

SUB_W12_GIMK_MIDO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_GIMK_MIDO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text: I was thinking the same thing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
This is a big heckin' rock right here—and this
must be the ancient inscription. Makes me think
a spirit might be living in the thing, maybe?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Hmm, let me see... 'When the divine sword
was sealed in ice by the devil's power,
God used the might of spring light to...' Sorry, Mr. Mido, but the word for 'melt'
has disappeared from the translation.
I think someone actually erased it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Well, since the inscription itself doesn't
seem damaged, we're still right as rain.
See this symbol here? I bet that's what
corresponds to 'melt.'

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
I don't think we have enough
artifacts to make this shape.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Then let's do another loop and see if
we can't find a few more lying around.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_00.text:
These must be the bathhouse ruins
we heard about.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Sure does look like the seal, doesn't it?
Can you read what it says?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Hmm... The words being used are really old,
so I'm not entirely sure, but I think it says
something like, 'These baths should all freeze!'

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Well, shoot. I wonder what led some fella
to graffiti a curse on a bathhouse.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Doesn't look like there's much
else of interest around here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.text:
These must be the watchtower
ruins we heard about.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Sure does look like the seal, doesn't it?
Can you read what it says?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Hmm... It's really old language, so I'm not
entirely sure, but I think it says something
like, 'Freeze, you creepy peepers!'

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Wonder if someone from the palace wrote that.
Or maybe just a good samaritan looking to put
an end to no-goodniks spyin' on people who
are just mindin' their own business.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Doesn't look like there's much
else of interest around here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_000.text: These must be the church ruins we heard about.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Sure does look like the seal, doesn't it?
Can you read what it says?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Hmm... The words being used are really old,
so I'm not entirely sure, but I think it says
something like, 'Freeze, church!'

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_040.text: Guess even the church had enemies.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Doesn't look like there's much
else of interest around here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RUINS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RUINS_000_CUT_000_000.text: This is one of those artifacts, isn't it?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RUINS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RUINS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I think we'll need a few more of these to
open the seal. Let's visit some other places.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RUINS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RUINS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
This should be enough to open the seal.
Let's go swing by the palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
So this is the final emperor's palace, eh?
Let's go see what's inside.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text: Wait, Mr. Mido! Thing is, for as long as I can remember, I've heard the palace is cursed and that I should never, ever, ever go in here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text: Aw, that's just some malarkey they tell kids to keep 'em out of trouble. I mean, you don't really believe in that curse, right?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, um... Yes? Otherwise why
is everyone frozen? Well, whether I believe or not, we're not
getting inside. These gates won't open, and even
though those walls look climbable, there are
other invisible walls that block you off.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text: So somebody put the magic whammy on it, eh? Suppose it does look like there's some kind of seal set in these gates...

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I sense great power here—everyone who lives
near this place can feel it. That's why we've
been worried all this time that the curse of
the final emperor is real.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Which is all the more reason to solve his
mystery. But to do that, we need a way
to bust through this gosh-dang seal.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Maybe the members of the survey team could
tell us more about the final emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text: Good thinking. Let's go talk to 'em.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.text:
It's no good, Mr. Mido—we can't get through.
The gates won't open, and there are invisible
walls all around. Um, I mean...unless you
know something I don't?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.text:
Kid, all I know is that some kind of power 
is sealing the palace off.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.text:
If we can lift that, I bet bacon to sausages we
can get inside. We should go ask the members
of the survey team if they know anything.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Say, Leia? Do you happen to know how to
open the gates to the final emperor's palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_010.text:
You know as well as I that there's no way inside
that palace. If there was, I'd already be in there
giggling with archaeological delight!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Don't suppose you happen to know
how to undo that seal on the gates?
Secret password or magic beans
or something like that?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_030.text:
You, Mr. Mido, are no normal traveler
if you can discern the seal in those gates
at a mere glance.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Heck, I'm no expert—that's just the kinda
work I do back where I'm from. All I'm lookin'
to do here is help the kid out, you know?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Fair enough. That said, we're not exactly
experts ourselves. Indeed, the knowledge and
techniques involved in commanding this sort of
invisible power have long since been lost to us. All we know is that the pieces of the gates'
seal were scattered and likely discarded.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_060.text:
Not a huge fan of the 'scattered' bit there.
I'm guessin' we're gonna have to search
high and low to find all the pieces?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_070.text:
We believe the adherents of the final emperor
spent a great deal of time assembling the pieces
of that seal. Sadly, this all happened centuries
ago, and the details have been lost to time.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_080.text:
We'd hoped our recent excavation of historical
sites would turn up the rest of the pieces.
Not because we're followers of the final emperor,
mind; it's merely due to scholarly interest.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_090.text:
So basically, we gotta find a boatload
of pieces that are scattered all over
the place. That about sum it up?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_100.text:
But those pieces could be anywhere
in Grelon! We'll never find them all!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_LEIA_100_CUT_000_110.text:
Don't go worrying yourself over it, kid.
I got a nose for this sorta thing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_05.text: But somebody could enter the palace if they aren't from these parts, yeah?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_14.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_14.text:
So there's a key somewhere in this world?
Well then, let's get out there and find it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ROMAIN_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ROMAIN_100_CUT_000_080.text: I'll protect him with my life.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ROMAIN_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ROMAIN_100_CUT_000_090.text: Yeah, don't think my obligation goes that far.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Huh? Why didn't it work?
What are we missing?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
This is the symbol of the freezing curse;
we saw one just like it at the ruins. But no matter how much we muck around with it,
it just keeps emitting that freezing power.
There's no way to break the dang seal!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Um, could we maybe melt it?
If only I still had some matches...

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Melt it... Holy moly, kid, that's it!
The melting symbol! If we can use
that, it should thaw the seal!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text: Er, but do you even know what the melting symbol is, Mr. Mido?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Can't say it's one I'm familiar with, so we'll have
to look it up. You guys got a library or a museum
or something like that around here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
We sure do! There's a library in Duvall,
and a museum in Varsailles.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
You heard everyone's dreams about the final
emperor, right, Mr. Mido? So what do you think?
What's your sense of him now?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Well now, I'm just a fella from a different
country and a different time, so I don't know
that it's my place to be having opinions. But I will tell you this: all these dreams
sure are giving everybody the heebie-jeebies.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Well now, I'm just a fella from a different
country and a different time, so I don't know
that it's my place to be having opinions. But I will tell you this: folks sure do seem
to enjoy dreaming about the emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Well now, I'm just a fella from a different
country and a different time, so I don't know
that it's my place to be having opinions. And even if I wanted to, I don't know if
I could. Folks' dreams about that guy were
all over the place.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I know what you mean—which is why I feel
like there's something awful waiting for us!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I know what you mean—which is why I feel
there's something wonderful waiting for us!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I know what you mean—which is why I feel
like things are about to get complicated.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
You sure you wanna do this, kid?
You sure you wanna know what's
waiting for us around the bend?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text: I'm sure, Mr. Mido. I wanna know.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text: Leia? What are you doing here!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text:
I want to go with you to the final emperor's
palace. As a scholar, I have a great desire
to be one of the first to see it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text:
Well, that's fine with me.
What do you think, Mr. Mido?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text: Hey, never turn down a free expert.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text: Gabriel? What are you doing here!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text:
It seems I couldn't put my research behind me
after all; I just can't pass up a chance to
enter the final emperor's palace!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text:
Well, that's fine with me.
What do you think, Mr. Mido?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text: Hey, never turn down a free expert.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Long have I sought one who possesses a power such
as yours! Indeed, I am in awe of how effortlessly
you broke the seal that had flummoxed so many for
so long. You have my eternal gratitude.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text: You could have just told me the truth from the beginning, kid... Or should I be saying 'Your Majesty'? I mean, I am talking to the final emperor now, right?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
For the moment, I remain merely Alexandre.
But once I reclaim the power sealed away in
the palace, the true emperor shall be reborn!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
So you mean whether or not the emperor
will revive is still up in the air?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text: Would you look to deny me?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Don't love that you lied to me all this time,
but I honestly don't give two hoots what you do.
Far as I'm concerned, the fate of a world should
be decided by the folks who live in it. Lemme just ask you one thing, though:
were you being honest about wanting to
save all the people who ended up frozen?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I was indeed, Mr. Mido—and I fully intend
to unfreeze them all, for they are His
most valued subjects. But I have another boon to beg: I would have you
destroy the being sealing away the emperor's
power, for I have not the ability to do so myself—
and without that, I cannot unfreeze the others.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Now hold on there, guy. I've been doing what
I could for you, but these requests are
starting to sound just a tad unreasonable. But heck, I suppose I'll do it anyway,
just so Tsunanori Mido can go down in history
as the fella who revived a dang emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Thank you, Mr. Mido—I trust you
prefer me to express my gratitude
in the form of Alexandre?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
The little swindler who conned the whole lot
of us? Heck no, bud. Can't say I care to see
that fella's face ever again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Then this will be the last time you shall.
But should you visit Grelon again, know that
you will be most welcome here. Farewell, Mr. Mido. I pray you meet with
great success in the rest of your mission.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Gosh, I wonder what'll happen to Grelon now?
Almost afraid to see what the effects of all
this mucking around are gonna be.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Anyway, that's a deal for another time.
I better get my spirit power and head out.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
There never was an 'Alexandre.' The boy you knew
was a mere phantom I created to manipulate people
into breaking the seal on my palace—a seal which
has now been very much sundered.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Sorry there, guy. I know you think
you played me like a cheap fiddle,
but it just isn't the case. I followed my own destiny and made my own
choices here, and what happens next is gonna
happen because I chose it—not because
you pulled the wool over my eyes.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
What happens now is that I will arise again
to reign forevermore as the eternal emperor.
Do you truly claim this to be an action of your
choosing? That your will alone grants me life?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text: Yeah, no. I'm saying that what actually happens next is the emperor fails to rise again and is sealed away for all eternity.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Pathetic fool! You misunderstand the extent
of my power, and will pay for your hubris by
becoming a sacrifice in my resurrection rite!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
Welp, that oughta ensure the final emperor's
obedience for a while—and also save all the
folks who went and got themselves frozen.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
But as for where Alexandre split to,
I guess that'll have to remain a mystery.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
Right then. Time to grab my spirit power
and get the heck outta this place.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text: Well, gosh. Guess that explains how you knew so much about the final emperor, seeing as you actually are him. Heck, you even pretended to be frozen so the kid would bring you here! Pretty clever stuff, that. So what happens now?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Nothing at all. Nothing is what happens.
Why, did you expect me to make some grand 
cackling proclamation about how the empire
will be reborn or the like? No, the legend of the final emperor is long over,
so I'm simply going to take some time and
figure out how to best use this power.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text: Are you going to unfreeze everyone?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Of course. Well, except for the jerks who pissed
me off—they can stay frozen forever. ...Aaah ha ha! Kidding! Oh my god, your faces!
No, out of respect for all of Alexandre's
hard work, I intend to unfreeze everyone. This is all because of you, Alexandre.
You should be very proud.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
This is... No. None of this feels right.
I'm starting to understand why this place was
sealed away in the first place, and I don't
think we should let the emperor's power out.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
If that's how you feel, kid,
I imagine you're probably right.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text: *sigh* Do the two of you know what it means to 'overstep your bounds'? If not, please allow me to teach you right now—but know that the fee for the lesson will be your lives.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.text:
...Alexandre? How strange. I was dreaming
I'd acquired the power of the final emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.text: It was a dream, Leia. Just a dream.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.text: Oh, you betcha. Just a dream.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
Is it okay to leave things like this?
I mean, Leia doesn't remember anything.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
Hard to know if the final emperor is gone now
or not. Heck, don't feel like I'm strong enough
to have ended the guy, so it wouldn't surprise
me one bit if he popped back around sometime.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
And when that happens, someone will
have to stand and face him.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text: Maybe that somebody is you, kid.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
Maybe. I don't know if I'm capable of that,
but I'd certainly try my best.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
So long as that's your attitude,
we don't got a thing to worry about.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text: Well, gosh. Guess that explains how you knew so much about the final emperor, seeing as you actually are him. Heck, you even pretended to be frozen so the kid would bring you here! Pretty clever stuff, that. So what happens now?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Nothing at all. Nothing is what happens.
Why, who could possibly believe that the final
emperor might appear in this day and age? But though the empire is naught but an
anachronism at this point, the power here
can still be wielded in the modern day—
and in very modern ways.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text: Are you going to unfreeze everyone?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Ah, that's right. There are still people
trapped in the ice, aren't there? Well, if you wish it, Alexandre, I will restore
them all. Otherwise, they will remain as they
are now. This choice belongs to you alone—
such is the essence of power.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
This is... No. None of this feels right.
I'm starting to understand why this place was
sealed away in the first place, and I don't
think we should let the emperor's power out.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
If that's how you feel, kid,
I imagine you're probably right.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
You two are more clever than I thought.
Only a fool would settle for being ruled
by such a power—the wise person chooses
to rule for themselves!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text: I never imagined it would end like this.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
You did all you could, kid, which means it's
time for you to hold your head high and start
looking to the future. I think we both know
that's what Gabriel would have wanted.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
But is the emperor's power really gone?
Or will it be restored one day?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
Hey, who can say? Maybe, maybe not.
The real question is, what are you
gonna do if it comes back?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
I won't be ruled by that kind of thing.
I'll fight it with everything I have.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
So long as that's your attitude,
we got nothing to worry about.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
So you come to me once more, my new sacrificial
lamb. You have been chosen; this monster that was
once hailed as emperor will now use your flesh to gain
a vast new power. And indeed, perhaps I will need to remain in
this land for the rest of time in order to
keep such a monstrous form at bay.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Now hang on, guy. Isn't lust for power the
reason you took that form in the first place?
This is all on you—and keeping monsters sealed
away is also your duty as emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text: To protect Grelon, I must eliminate the infernal beings who come here from the Conjoined Worlds. This is why I require power—the blame for my actions rests entirely with you and your ilk!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text: Well now, that's just silly. I mean, sure, folks who come from the Heavens aren't necessarily good, but what does a guy gotta do to convince you that I mean this world no harm?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
You can destroy this vile flesh and release
my tormented soul from its sealing duties.
For I am so very weary...

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
But if the soul of the final emperor has
been protecting Grelon this whole time,
who's going to do it when you're gone!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
You have wisdom enough to know
the answer to that question.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Now, you infernal being!
Show me the nobility of your soul!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
The soul of the final emperor has been freed.
...So, kid? You know the answer to that
little riddle he posed at the end?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
I do. All of us who live in Grelon have to
take on the responsibility of protecting it.
It won't be easy, but it has to be done.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
You're a pretty amazing kid, Alexandre—and it
makes me feel good knowing I can get back to
my work because this place is in fine hands.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
Good luck in finding your spirits.
And thank you for everything. Truly.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text:
So my new form comes at last. Rejoice, for you
have been chosen! Your body has all I require:
compatibility with my soul, great magical power,
and the charm to inspire others. And now, my vessel, I would have you
offer unto me your flesh!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text:
Criminy, I knew it was a mistake to bring
you here, kid. This whole thing's a trap!
We'll handle things from here, buster.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text: You just scoot your buns outta here. Go!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text: I'll not let you escape this time!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text: Your only enemy here is me!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.text:
So had the final emperor taken the power of
spirits for himself? Guess the Wave's guidance
had me on the right track all along.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.text:
Seems like being expelled from Grelon was also
part of my destiny. I just hope Alexandre is okay
and that he can rescue the other frozen folks.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Who seeks my power? Who has managed to
overcome the trial and enter my palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Cripes, if this is the emperor's true form,
I get why they all sealed him away.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Grant me your power! I beg it of you!
Become one with me, that I might
use your strength to save this world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text: No, Leia! That won't save anything!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text: You mustn't judge a book by its cover, Alexandre. Besides, it will be me using this power.... Using it to save the world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
I admire your ambition! Now let us see
if your flesh is as strong as your will.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Nngh... So much...power...
surging through me!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Probably best we don't let that
power leave this place.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text:
I couldn't do it, Alexandre... I couldn't
handle the power of the final emperor...

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text:
Looks like you and me are gonna
have to settle this, guy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text:
Impudent fool! Do you think that was
all of the power I possessed!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text: Have a taste of my TRUE might!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
Seems like it, but who can say? Fellas like
that tend to pop up at the worst times.
Sorry, kid. Wish I had better news for you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
No, that's okay. This is our problem now—so
if he does come back, we'll just defeat him.
We can't afford to let anyone be tempted
by that power ever again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
Got nothing to worry about with you here,
kid. I think I can get back to my work now.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
I'm going to become a strong person just
like you, Mr. Mido. So...thank you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text: No, thank you. I learned a real important lesson from you today. And with that, I gotta hightail it. Take care of yourself, bud.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Who seeks my power? Who has managed to
overcome the trial and enter my palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Cripes, if this is the emperor's true form,
I get why they all sealed him away.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Grant me your power! I beg it of you!
Become one with me, that I might use
your strength to bring order to this world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Power is an ugly thing, Alexandre.
Freedom and kindness are beautiful, yes,
but beautiful things cannot maintain order
in this world. Only force can do that.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
You believe yourself ready for my power?
Good. Let us see if that is truly the case.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Nngh... So much...power...
surging through me!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Probably best we don't let that
power leave this place.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_010_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_010_.text:
I couldn't handle the power of the
final emperor, Alexandre... But you...

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
Seems like it, but who can say? Fellas like
that tend to pop up at the worst times.
Sorry, kid. Wish I had better news for you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
The lust for power is what kept the final
emperor alive for so long. That's something
we all have inside us—and something that
isn't ever going to change.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
I hope you can continue to resist
the temptation, kid. I really do.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
I hope I can, too—but it helps that I don't
like what it turned the emperor into.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
In the end, that's a choice only the
folks here can make. But as for me,
it's time to be off.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text: Thank you for everything, Mr. Mido.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
So my new form comes at last. Rejoice, for you
have been chosen! Your body has all I require:
compatibility with my soul, great magical power,
and the charm to inspire others. And now, my vessel, I would have you
offer unto me your flesh!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Remember well the fiend that haunts this
place, Alexandre. For when this occurs again
someday, I want you to be the one to save
the children of the future.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
As for you, demon, the new form you sought
once before stands before you now.
Come and claim it, if you can!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text: I've no need of senile old fools. Begone!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Do not fear, child.
Soon, you will be mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
And as for you, my otherworldly visitor,
I will brook no interference from your ilk!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
The fate of this world should be decided by
the folks who live in it—but Alexandre's
future belongs to him alone. And fella,
I ain't gonna let you take it from him.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Bwaaa ha ha ha! Bold words indeed!
But have you the power to back them up?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
Sure wish I knew, kid. I mean, it feels like it,
but I can't say if that fella's power is really
gone from this world or not. I know this, though: one day, this world is gonna
find itself in crisis again. And when that day
comes, it's gonna be your battle to fight.
Romain knew it, and I know it, too.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text: But I can't! I'll never be like Romain!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
Heck, kid, no one expects you to be.
You're not Romain, you're Alexandre.
And all that means is that you'll need to
find your own way to take on the world.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
I wish I had your confidence,
but...okay. I'll try.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
I hope those other folks got thawed now that the
curse is lifted, but I can't stick around to check.
This is where our adventure ends, kid—and if
I'm honest, I've had a heck of a time.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
I couldn't have done any of this without you,
Mr. Mido, so thank you. I'll be praying that
you find the spirits you seek.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
So you come to me once more, my new sacrificial
lamb. You have been chosen; this monster that was
once hailed as emperor will now use your flesh to gain
a vast new power. And indeed, perhaps I will need to remain in
this land for the rest of time in order to
keep such a monstrous form at bay.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
I have heard these words before, Alexandre—on
the day my father sent me fleeing from this palace.
And I have spent every day since thinking about
how to release the emperor from his fate.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
It is time to follow in my father's footsteps.
Expel your exhausted self from that body and
claim mine instead! Then empower its flesh so
I might seize command of this world from you!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
I don't understand what you're saying,
Romain! I don't understand at all!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text: Now it is your turn, Alexandre.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text: Just hold up a second there, kid.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text: You said this was a trap, Romain, and you're sure right about that. But cripes, I never imagined you would be the one who set it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
You make a fair point there, guy...
But I still have to protect Alexandre.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
Where did I go wrong? All I ever wanted
was to release the final emperor...

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
I am a sinful man. A horror.
There can be no absolution for this.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
The final emperor and Romain are both gone.
Did... Did I do the wrong thing?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
Not at all, kid. Because of you, the fiend
that was fused to the emperor is also gone,
which means the curse has been lifted. The wrong thing?
Kid, you did nothin' but right.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
...I guess I did, huh? I mean, it really does
feel like a weight's been lifted off me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text: The door's locked. Should we break it down?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
I'm sensing something a bit off here, kid.
Better step back.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Fiends tend to nest in the darkness.
Wonder if that holds in this world too.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
The fiends are here because of the curse!
Grelon's a peaceful place, I swear!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text: Don't think this hut's quite safe yet.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text: No, yeah. We can use the cable car now.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
We can use this to get to the ski slope
or down to the bottom of the hill!

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text: The ice is changing, Mr. Mido!

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Cripes, it's turning into a fiend.
Okay, you frozen so-and-so! Come get me!

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
I've never seen a real-life fiend before!
People said they roam around in caves and mines,
but I always thought those were just stories
made up to scare children.

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Could be this is connected to the
emperor's curse somehow?

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.text: Huh!? The ice is turning into a fiend again!

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_020_CUT_000.text:
Get a new trick, ice fiend!
You can't surprise me anymore!

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_020_CUT_000.text:
I like the spirit, kid—but I'm still
the guy who's gotta fight 'em, yeah?

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_030_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_030_CUT_000.text: Enough with this ice fiend business!

SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_030_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_FUNC_MIDO_MELTBATTLE_030_CUT_000.text: Yep. Just lemme deal with it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey, got a question: you know anything
about spirits? Rumor? Myth? Local legend?
Story your dear old granny told you?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It is said an emperor of yore sought the
power of spirits. But if I may ask,
what exactly is your purpose here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Morgane
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, there are lots of fiends around.
Is that what you're talking about?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Eric
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, I guess fiends sometimes appear
in the mines. Is that what you mean?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Virgile
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_060.text:
The locals speak of a beautiful woman who lures
men into the snowy mountains, but I call bullplop
on that—especially the 'beautiful woman' part.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_070.text:
There are five types of spirits: fire, water,
wood, metal, and earth... But all that's
got nothing to do with me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_080.text:
My father was taken away by
spirits some 20 years past.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Remi
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_090.text:
If such beings truly exist, I would like to lay
eyes upon them. Surely that would liven up
the drudgery of my day-to-day existence!

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Beings that cannot be perceived by the
naked eye? Yes, I know there are some
who believe in such things...

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_000_CUT_000_.text: Care to join me on my journey there, guy?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GUILLAUME_000_CUT_000_.text:
If you think I could be of assistance,
I'm happy to come along.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_ESPERANCE_000_CUT_000_.text: Care to join me on my journey?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_000_CUT_000_000.text: Looks like there's a spirit here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_000_CUT_000_010.text: Better get myself sorted out first...

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, ain't that a deal? I nabbed
myself the power of a water spirit.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.text: All that's left is to bring it home.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Everything worked out okay because of you,
Mr. Mido. Thank you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Sure did, kid—because that's what
the folks in this world wanted.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Please come visit us again sometime!
You'll always be welcome here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_000.text: Am I sure I'm didn't forget anything?

SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W12_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_010.text: Nah, I'm good. Let's go home.
